lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because:
Once, I met a young woman in an airport waiting lounge who had a distinctive tattoo of a mathematical formula on her left arm.  Although I had my camera with me, I was too shy to ask her to let me photograph her tattoo.  I wasn't too shy to ask her what it meant, though.  She told me she was a graduate student of economics; the formula represented an equation for distribution of wealth. (Unless I'm mistaken, the tattoo was the Gini Coefficient, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gini_coefficient.)

How appealing it was for her to use her intellect in ways that will improve the world as well as herself.  And how compelling that she literally wore what she carried in her heart on her sleeve.

What better way to export democracy than through its handmaiden, capitalism?  I hope that our collective generosity pays economic, social, and political dividends around the world, where we most need it.  

It pleases me to share the blessings I have received with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I think, write, and edit other people's writing for a living.  I am also a graduate student (still more thinking and writing).

lenders.occupational_info: A tour company for Oxford and Cambridge, UK. We are a social enterprise using university students to give tours.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
These first 6 loans are in honor of my mother for Mother's Day.  I chose 6 loans specifically for working mom's who want to make a better life for their family.

I will continue to loan because I believe microfinance is a viable part of a broader solution at reducing 3rd world poverty.

lenders.name: Richard Grijalva
lenders.loan_because: I like to help
lenders.occupational_info: I help people when they have problems with their Internet connection.

lenders.name: Cristián
lenders.occupational_info: I write promotional material and go to school.  My wife helps people who have trouble speaking and or swallowing.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have a happy family life with my wife and three sons and I want others to be able to share this.  In a small way I can help others to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the main carer for my sons and our home.  My wife is a senior executive with a large UK company.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
“For of those to whom much is given, much is required.”  
“One person can make a difference and every person should try.”
“All of us do not have equal talent, but all of us should have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.”

Words to live by, from John F. Kennedy, 35th President of the United States
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that cleans up gasoline and oil spills from pipelines and tanks.  We remove the gasoline from ground water so that it can be used by people.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: people with initiative deserve opportunities to succeed.

lenders.name: Rusty
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of helping people help themselves — it's like the old saying, "Give a man a fish, feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime."
lenders.occupational_info: I design publications, brochures, websites, etc.

lenders.name: Jesse and Natalie
lenders.loan_because: every bit counts.

lenders.name: Rosangela
lenders.loan_because: Eu comprei a sociedade de uma loja e preciso saldar o que falta.
lenders.occupational_info: A loja é uma avicultura.Eu vendo ração para animais.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am still in school and enjoy learning something new about the world every day!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.  For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that everyone who believes into Him would not perish, but would have eternal life.  God desires all men to be saved and to come to the full knowledge of the truth.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people do what they have decided is worthwhile to do.

lenders.name: Sarah Nelsen Designs
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change lives through Kiva and lending money to an entrepreneur creates a relationship of love and support between the lender and the recipient. The loan continues to give through the cycle of lending!
lenders.occupational_info: Professional, award-winning graphic design. Providing custom designs for print and web with a focus in design for arts-focused, non-profit, and start-up companies.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped in many ways by many people, and I would like to help others as a way of paying it forward.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I care about my brothers and sisters in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 5 & 6 year olds.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way of directly stimulating economies in poorer countries. Everyone who has the desire of starting their own business should be given the chance.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to follow their dreams.

lenders.name: Remington
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a cool way to help people out.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Study study study

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have never doubted that a small group of thoughtful, commited citizens can change the world. Those citizens make up my lending team.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: this is an incredibly rewarding experience

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I give money because I'm a firm believe that we as a race of humans have a duty to help one another. I many not have much, but with working with others around the world, I have the ability to forever impact the lives of those in communities around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to children in South Korea.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed  and change society for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large city government to build parks, children's playground, bicycle trails and improve the environment in the city.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to earn their own.

lenders.name: Decker
lenders.loan_because: God tells us that it is better to give then to receive. And I love to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a blessing. I provide total renovation to all future homebuyers.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: K+B+Finn Myers
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of women to lift themselves, their children, and their communities out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a foundation that supports broad-based, locally driven community development in Latin America. Our programs range from small business loans, to alternative energy, from educational endeavors, to environmental awareness and conservation efforts. Philanthropiece...piecing together a better world.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: The difference between a loan and a gift is like the difference between taking a class for a grade, or simply auditing. You work harder, and feel more pride in your success, when you have expectations to fulfill.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stuff.

lenders.name: neil
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and see how Kiva and various loans work on a personal basis
lenders.occupational_info: I do research into why people buy "green" (environmentally friendly) products

lenders.name: Joseph Nissen
lenders.loan_because: I am a human being.
lenders.occupational_info: Handling all things web related for the company site.

lenders.name: katelyn
lenders.loan_because: i believe in humanity.

lenders.name: Jose Tijam
John
lenders.loan_because: I was raised by my single mom. These loans are in her honor.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am now a Commercial Truck Driver. 
I drive the lower 48 states. I am an owner operator.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people around the world to become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary school teacher.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs who  are taking control of their livelihood in limiting circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Bond Finance

lenders.name: Conor
lenders.loan_because: Someone once gave me a micro-loan, and I am very thankful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Finance student.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.occupational_info: I am an architect - I design houses and public spaces.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy working in a support role, and I was uneasy about the idea that simple charity can hurt a country.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math and computer classes.

lenders.name: Chris and Beth
lenders.loan_because: it is wonderful to think what such a small amount can do for someone else to be self-sustaining!

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: people loaned me money when i was broke and going to college.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Americans living abroad to adopt orphan children and become US citizens.

lenders.name: Debbie P.
lenders.loan_because: hopefully someday someone will loan to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in College trying to achieve my educational goals.  Someday I'd like to go to law school or medical school.
